title: Hallelujah
lyrics: Your love is amazing, steady and unchanging
Your love is a mountain, firm beneath my feet
Your love is a mystery, how You gently lift me
When I am surrounded, your love carries me
Your love is surprising, I can feel it rising
All the joy that’s growing, deep inside of me
Every time I see you, all your goodness shines through
I can feel this God song rising up in me
Lord, You make me sing, sing, sing
chords: G D/F# Am G G D/F# C (x3)
raw_text:
Hallelujah
Brenton Brown | Brian Doerkson
Intro: G/B C D C
Verse 1:
G/B C2
Your love is amazing, steady and unchanging
Dsus C2
Your love is a mountain, firm beneath my feet
G/B C2
Your love is a mystery, how You gently lift me
Dsus C2
When I am surrounded, your love carries me
Chorus:
G Dsus Em
Hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelujah
C
Your love makes me sing
G Dsus Em
Hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelujah
C
Your love makes me sing
Verse 2:
G/B C2
Your love is surprising, I can feel it rising
Dsus C2
All the joy that’s growing, deep inside of me
G/B C2
Every time I see you, all your goodness shines through
Dsus C2
I can feel this God song rising up in me
Chorus:
G Dsus Em
Hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelujah
C
Your love makes me sing
G Dsus Em
Hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelujah
C
Your love makes me sing
Bridge:
D Em7
Yes You make me sing
D/F# C2
Lord, You make me sing, sing, sing
D Em7 D/F#
How You make me sing
Interlude:
G D/F# Am G G D/F# C (x3)
Chorus:
G Dsus4 Em
Hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelujah
C
Your love makes me sing
G Dsus4 Em
Hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelujah
C
Your love makes me sing
